congrats_data.msg:
You have completed the programme. Well done!
Remember, you can always return to ParentText to review these tips. Just type {MENU}.
congrats_data.extra_msg: Was ParentText helpful? If so, share it with a friend. Just send this link: {share link}

make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.message: The tips you haven't finished are:
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_multiple_options: Which tip would you like to receive?

make_options_wrapper_data.msg_no_options.message: You haven't received any tips yet.
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.message: You have received the following tips:
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.question: Would you like to review it?
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.no_message: That's okay. You can come back here at any time to review it.
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_multiple_options: You have completed @fields.n_s_modules_compl out of @fields.n_s_modules tips. Which of the following tips would you like to review?

description_data.msg: In this program, you will receive @fields.c_n_mod tips. Your first tip is "@results.name".

wa_templates_META.text:
Itâ€™s a difficult moment for your family. Iâ€™m here today with a few tips to create small moments of connection with your child to give them the routine and stability you all need right now. 

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Continue with my registration
2. Remind me tomorrow

1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

interaction_data.question:
Itâ€™s a difficult moment for your family. Iâ€™m here today with a few tips to create small moments of connection with your child to give them the routine and stability you all need right now. 

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Continue with my registration
2. Remind me tomorrow
